name: Dwarf empire
description:
Dwarf Empire is an HTML5 game based on Adventure Capitalist., created with Phaser3-boilerplate template.

source code is available at https://github.com/agar3s/advcapitalist

Credits

Development, game design and game concept by @agar3s Art adapted by @prinfrexita based on assets from Kandi Maciejewski https://www.artstation.com/artbykandles/store Sound and Music, various, https://soundcloud.com/user-500193990
